plot: Helle Lyster travels to Cyprus, portraying the divided island. Danmarks Radio (Danish television broadcaster) and Jyllands-Posten (one of the leading Danish newspapers) join forces to produce this travel documentary.
title: DR-Explorer: Cypern - en delt ø
plot_es: Helle Lyster travels to Cyprus, portraying the divided island. Danmarks Radio (Danish television broadcaster) and Jyllands-Posten (one of the leading Danish newspapers) join forces to produce this travel documentary.
plot_en: Helle Lyster travels to Cyprus, portraying the divided island. Danmarks Radio (Danish television broadcaster) and Jyllands-Posten (one of the leading Danish newspapers) join forces to produce this travel documentary.
